metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8690 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The bmp_getdata function in libjasper/bmp/bmp_dec.c in JasPer before 1.900.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted BMP image in an imginfo command.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8690` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.4
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> The original fix is incomplete resulting in two follow ups CVE-2016-8884 and CVE-2016-8885 relevant part included in 14_CVE-2016-10249.patch

criterions.comment: jasper package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-14ubuntu3.4').
